1: God, save me by your name. By your power judge me justly.
2: God, hear my prayer. Turn your ear to the words of my mouth.
3: For strangers have risen up against me. Ruthless men seek my life. They pay no attention to God. Interlude
4: Indeed, God is my helper. The Lord is the one who preserves my life.
5: Let evil return on those who oppress me. In your faithfulness destroy them.
6: I will sacrifice willingly to you. I will praise your name, O Lord, because it is good.
7: Surely, from all my distress he has delivered me. My eyes have looked down on my enemies.
